thread.title: Good value hotel in fun area in NYC
thread.title_full: Good value hotel in fun area in NYC - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: apdelgado
title: Good value hotel in fun area in NYC
text:
Stayed there in a mixture of business / leisure travel. Good compact designed rooms in a boutique hotel. Really enjoyed the waterfall showers. The area is great near Little Italy, Chinatown & Nolita. Really good value for money for a boutique hotel in NYC.
Not many facilities, more like a serviced apartment.
Room Tip: Check out the view from the rooftop See more room tips
